note:
A pathetic creature of meat and bone. Paid to do things with multitudes of big computers, and to help others do similar. Cats, coffee, music, movies, etc. Rarely has aught of interest to post lately, but hopefully that'll change eventually.

Profile backdrop is a picture of the spines of a selection of vinyl records, mostly film soundtracks.

Avatar is a close up of a pin badge, from the anime series Neon Genesis Evangelion. It bears the text "Evangelion test type-01" and the head of the Eva.
